name: Hibernacorns
description:
Hibernacorns is a vertical platformer about gathering acorns for winter.

It was created for the  Great Autumn Game Jam 2021.

Hi! We made this game in about 3 weeks (more like 1 considering how much i procrastinated but ANYWAY) for the great autum game jam 2021! The game is, as you will be able to tell, not even close to being finished. I don't know if I'll update it in the future but if i do, updates would include:

- NPC's in the village with narrative elements

- A day system where you're supposed to gather enough nuts before winter

- More gameplay variations (rain, frozen leaves, wind, you know the drill)

- And even more bugs! (probably) c:

Controls:

A and D / Q and D to move left and right, space to jump and hold space while in the air to use your glider! And your mouse to navigate the menus.

Sound and music:

  • Zapsplat.com 

Game made by: 

https://twitter.com/thewildeus

https://twitter.com/cocoaniable

(Special thanks to my mom for making me food while i was melting my brain on unity)
